# Framework

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

# Define UI ----

# Shiny ideas from https://github.com/santiagosnchez/genetic_drift
ui <- fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Genetic Drift Simulator"),
    sidebarLayout(
        sidebarPanel(
            numericInput(
                inputId = "population_size", 
                label = "Population Size", 
                value = 100, 
                step = 1, 
                min = 2,
                max = 500
            ), 
            sliderInput(
                inputId = "initial_frequency", 
                label = "Initial Allele Frequency", 
                min = 0, 
                max = 1, 
                step = 0.05, 
                value = 0.50
            ), 
            selectInput(
                inputId = "bottleneck_type",
                label = "Bottleneck Type",
                choices = c("Founder", "Dominant Pathogen", "Recessive Pathogen", "Natural Disaster", "Thanos Snap"),
                selected = "Thanos Snap"
            ),
            numericInput(
                inputId = "survival_rate",
                label = "Survival Rate",
                value = 0.50,
                step = 0.05, 
                min = 0.05,
                max = 0.95
            ),
            actionButton(
                inputId = "run", 
                label = "Run"
            ), 
            actionButton(
                inputId = "reset", 
                label = "Reset"
            ), 
            actionButton(
                inputId = "bottleneck", 
                label = "Bottleneck!"
            )
        ),
        mainPanel(
            fluidRow(
                column(
                    4, 
                    verbatimTextOutput("Plots")
                )
            ),
            fluidRow(
                column(
                    8, 
                    plotOutput("freq_plot")
                )
            )
        )
    )
)


# Define server logic ----
server <- function(input, output) {
    output$population_size = renderText({
        input$population_size
    })
    
    output$initial_frequency = renderText({
        input$initial_frequency
    })
    
    observeEvent(input$run, {
        # Start simulation
        create.generation()
    })
    
    observeEvent(input$reset, {
        # Stop simulation and clear progress
    })
    
    observeEvent(input$bottleneck, {
        # Use bottleneck function we create.
    })
}

# Run the app ----
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)



```
